doc.title: The Ieat Durian Degustation II: Ah Loon and Ah Teck's Boutique Durian Stall
doc.text: The/DT pictures/NN say/VB it/PRP all/RB ./. This/DT is/VBZ especially/RB so/RB when/WRB mom/PRP is/VBZ also/RB in/IN the/DT thick/NN of/IN things/NNS ./. Yes/EX ,/, when/WRB it/PRP comes/VBZ to/TO durians/NN ,/, it/PRP is/VBZ the/DT fruit/NN that/WDT is/VBZ the/DT main/JJ focus/NN and/CC nothing/NN else/RB matters/NN ./. No/JJ one/CD bothers/VBZ that/IN the/DT tables/NNS are/VBP not/RB cleaned/VBD ,/, that/WDT you/PRP can/MD throw/VB the/DT seeds/NN into/IN a/DT dirty/JJ plastic/NN box/NN and/CC it/PRP is/VBZ permissible/JJ to/TO stuff/NN a/DT whole/JJ durian/NN segment/NN in/IN your/PRP$ mouth/NN because/IN you/PRP got/VBD to/TO use/VB your/PRP$ hands/NN to/TO open/VB the/DT durian/NN ./.
